ResourceHeader.Description: The University of Alabama hosts the repository for the HamSCI Personal Space Weather Station (PSWS) Network, providing public access to HF Doppler shift and ground magnetometer observations collected by citizen science contributors and researchers. This repository supports space weather studies through community-based data collection and is part of the NSF-funded PSWS initiative.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: The PSWS database is made possible by support from National Science Foundation (NSF) grants for the Personal Space Weather Station project.
